Messages.Value: Thank you for calling the travel agency, my name is Evelyn Perez. How may I assist you today?
Yes, hi, my name is John Smith and I am very upset. My flight was cancelled and I had important business to attend to in New York City. I am extremely disappointed in your service.
I'm so sorry to hear that, Mr. Smith. May I have your flight number and departure date?
Yes, it was flight DL103 from Atlanta to New York City on July 7th.

I see. Unfortunately, there was an unexpected issue with the flight and it had to be cancelled. However, we can definitely assist you in finding a new flight, would you like me to pull up some options?
No, I don't want to look at any other flights. I want to complain and demand a refund. This is unacceptable and I am very unhappy with your service.
I completely understand your frustration, Mr. Smith. We will do our best to make this right for you. Let me look into the refund process for you and we can go from there.
Well it's about time you did something to help me. I am extremely dissatisfied with your company and I will definitely be leaving a negative review.

I apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you, Mr. Smith. I have initiated the refund process for you, and you can expect to see the funds back in your account within the next 7-10 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, that will be all. I hope your company can learn from this experience and improve your service so others don't have to go through what I did.
Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Mr. Smith. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to continue to improve our service. Have a good day.

Conversation.Full_conversation:
Agent: Thank you for calling the travel agency, my name is Evelyn Perez. How may I assist you today?
Customer: Yes, hi, my name is John Smith and I am very upset. My flight was cancelled and I had important business to attend to in New York City. I am extremely disappointed in your service.
Agent: I'm so sorry to hear that, Mr. Smith. May I have your flight number and departure date?
Customer: Yes, it was flight DL103 from Atlanta to New York City on July 7th.
Agent: I see. Unfortunately, there was an unexpected issue with the flight and it had to be cancelled. However, we can definitely assist you in finding a new flight, would you like me to pull up some options?
Customer: No, I don't want to look at any other flights. I want to complain and demand a refund. This is unacceptable and I am very unhappy with your service.
Agent: I completely understand your frustration, Mr. Smith. We will do our best to make this right for you. Let me look into the refund process for you and we can go from there.
Customer: Well it's about time you did something to help me. I am extremely dissatisfied with your company and I will definitely be leaving a negative review.
Agent: I apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you, Mr. Smith. I have initiated the refund process for you, and you can expect to see the funds back in your account within the next 7-10 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Customer: No, that will be all. I hope your company can learn from this experience and improve your service so others don't have to go through what I did.
Agent: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Mr. Smith. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to continue to improve our service. Have a good day.
